name: Crisp

features.name: Centralized Inbox
features.description: Combines messages from various channels (emails, website chat, WhatsApp, etc.) into one collaborative inbox for efficient management.

features.name: Knowledge Base
features.description: Allows businesses to create and manage help articles, enabling customers to find answers independently.

features.name: CRM
features.description: Synchronizes customer data for personalized interactions.

features.name: Automations
features.description: AI-driven workflows that streamline tasks and reduce team workload.

features.name: Website Widget
features.description: Engages website visitors in real-time for support and feedback.

features.name: Campaigns
features.description: Sends automated, contextually relevant messages to customers across multiple channels.

integration: Extensive integrations with platforms like Slack, Shopify, and more.
support: Responsive customer support praised for being helpful and accommodating.
scalability: Designed to meet the needs of businesses of all sizes, from solopreneurs to large-scale companies.
customization: Offers customization options for chat interface and triggers, though some users desire more.

reviews_pros.description: User-friendly interface making it easy to set up and use.
Feature-rich with tools like live chat, AI chatbots, and integrations.
Affordability, especially for small to medium businesses.
Live translation for communicating with customers in different languages.

reviews_cons.description: Notification issues, particularly on the mobile app.
Difficulties with integrations, particularly with specific platforms like Shopify.
